<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 316 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You conjure an arrow of acid that continues corroding the target after it hits. Make a spell attack against the target. On a hit, you deal 3d8 acid damage plus 1d6 persistent acid damage. On a critical hit, double the initial damage, but not the persistent damage.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The initial damage increases by 2d8, and the persistent acid damage increases by 1d6.
name: Acid Arrow
